title: Did Lawmakers Who Legalized Raw Milk Get Sick from Drinking Raw Milk to Celebrate?
subtitle: An investigation by the West Virginia Department of Health was inconclusive, though evidence suggests the culprit could have been the stomach flu.
author: David Emery
vclaim: After passing a bill to make consuming raw milk legal in the state, several members of the West Virginia legislature fell ill due to drinking raw milk to celebrate the bill becoming law.
